attributes.action: Stop student accommodation rent and reduce tuition fees for final semester.
attributes.additional_details: We also shouldn’t be required to pay around £3,000 for tuition for slides online and inadequate teacher videos and resources we are not able to access.
attributes.background: Students have been advised to go home and leave accommodations but stuck in contracts requiring them to pay for a place they are not residing due to universities closing. It is a circumstance that is out of our control and we shouldn’t have to be a further £3,000+ in debt at no fault of our own.
